Hi Nichole, 

Sure, we have a look through each of them and double check the recipients. We will update you once this is complete.
@manuel I believed the contact form details is outdated, kindly check it. Thanks

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath/team

This is something I've just seen, when creating new forms on the Aviso websites I think it was copied across from another build (WA) and none of the details of the email notifications or form details were updated - hence a contact form somehow seems to have come from Eagle website and directed to WA team! I've logged into Eagle and I'm updating the form ASAP now, can you please check across all sites you have and ensure this hasn't occurred on any others?

Thanks,

Nichole

Nichole Valk

m: 0425 699 660

e: nvalk@avisogroup.com.au | w: avisogroup.com.au

p: PO Box 99, Caringbah NSW 1495

﻿On 22/5/20, 1:20 pm, "Richard Thomlinson" <RichardT@avisowa.com.au> wrote:

Hi Nicole

Received this today.....can you provide some feedback as to what is required, this doesn't appear to relate to a WA client????

Richard Thomlinson

Authorised Representative- TBS Risk

ANZIIF (Snr Associate) CIP

p: 08 6274 0525 | m: 0417 096 872 | f: 08 9250 5617

e: richardt@avisowa.com.au | w: www.avisowa.com.au

a: Level 4, 9 The Avenue, Midland WA 6056

a: PO BOX 1486 Midland 6936

ABN: 30 009 439 203 | AR No: 452906 | AFSL No: 230778 | Triton Broking Services (WA) Pty Ltd t/as Aviso WA

The information contained in this email and any attached files is strictly confidential and may contain legally privileged information. This email should be read by the intended addressee only. If the recipient of this message is not the intended addressee, please advise Triton Broking Services (WA) Pty Ltd t/as Aviso WA on +61 8 6274 0500 or team@avisowa.com.au and promptly delete this email and any attachments. The intended recipient of this email may only use, reproduce, disclose or distribute the information contained in this email and any attached files with Triton Broking Services (WA) Pty Ltd t/as Aviso WA's permission. If you are not the intended addressee, you are strictly prohibited from using, reproducing, disclosing or distributing the information contained in this email and any attached files. Although Triton Broking Services (WA) Pty Ltd t/as Aviso WA believes this e-mail and any attachments to be free of any virus or other defect which may affect your computer, it is the responsibility of the recipient to ensure that it is virus free and Triton Broking Services (WA) Pty Ltd t/as Aviso WA does not accept any responsibility for any loss or damage arising in any way from its use. Please consider the environment before printing this email. Thank you

-----Original Message-----

From: Anna Wilson <AnnaW@avisowa.com.au>

Sent: Friday, 22 May 2020 11:15 AM

To: Richard Thomlinson <RichardT@avisowa.com.au>

Subject: FW: Request from Aviso WA Website

Hi Richard

This extended email arrived in my JUNK box.

Is it in anyway connected to your Client - GCCO00 !

This last message appears to be from Nichole Valk - Aviso Group.

Anna

-----Original Message-----

From: nvalk@avisogroup.com.au <nvalk@avisogroup.com.au>

Sent: Monday, 18 May 2020 2:21 PM

To: Team <team@avisowa.com.au>

Subject: Request from Aviso WA Website

Hello,

Brenden Anforth - SURA Plant and Equipment Underwriting has submitted a contact form from the Aviso WA website.

Their details are below:

Full name

Brenden Anforth - SURA Plant and Equipment Underwriting

Email address

brenden.anforth@sura.com.au <mailto:brenden.anforth@sura.com.au>

Phone number

02 9047 9801

Insurance type

outstanding premium payment

Type in here...

I am trying your website as a last resort as your server keeps rejecting emails, please action as a matter of urgency.

Good afternoon Jason,

Thanks for your time on the phone this afternoon, hopefully you can provide some assistance.

Please find below email trail regarding attempts to find out where our outstanding premium is. The below emails indicate Eagle have been aware that they have received the funds from the 12th May. I emailed and left voicemails with David last week, with no response, along with Jack, as well as our operations manager doing same.

This issue needs to be rectified as a matter of urgency and we would appreciate immediate payment of the receipted funds.

Kind regards,

Brenden Anforth

Underwriter

T: +61 2 9047 9801 | E: Brenden.Anforth@sura.com.au | Website: www.sura.com.au/plant-and-equipment

SURA Plant and Equipment, 141 Walker Street, North Sydney NSW 2060 SURA Plant and Equipment Pty Ltd ABN 85 087 238 837 is an Authorised Representative of SURA Pty Ltd ABN 36 115 672 350 AFSL 294313

NOTICE: If you have received this message in error, please notify the sender by return email immediately and delete the message & attachments from your computer without making any copies. This email and attachments are confidential and may contain legally privileged information and/or copyright material belonging to SURA Plant and Equipment Pty Ltd or third parties. Internet emails are not guaranteed secure or error-free; we do not accept responsibility for changes made to this message after it was sent. While attachments are scanned, the recipient should check this email & attachments for viruses as we don't accept liability for damage caused by any transmitted viruses. This notice should remain intact.

From: Brenden Anforth

Sent: Thursday, 14 May 2020 2:14 PM

To: 'david@eagleinsurance.com.au' <david@eagleinsurance.com.au>

Subject: FW: URGENT Payment GOLDCOASTI

Hi David,

Has there been any result regarding this account from your end?

I understand the delay is not any one person's fault however this is dragging out needlessly and I need to get this account cleared off our debt list.

Kind regards,

Brenden Anforth

Underwriter

T: +61 2 9047 9801 | E: Brenden.Anforth@sura.com.au | Website: www.sura.com.au/plant-and-equipment

SURA Plant and Equipment, 141 Walker Street, North Sydney NSW 2060 SURA Plant and Equipment Pty Ltd ABN 85 087 238 837 is an Authorised Representative of SURA Pty Ltd ABN 36 115 672 350 AFSL 294313

NOTICE: If you have received this message in error, please notify the sender by return email immediately and delete the message & attachments from your computer without making any copies. This email and attachments are confidential and may contain legally privileged information and/or copyright material belonging to SURA Plant and Equipment Pty Ltd or third parties. Internet emails are not guaranteed secure or error-free; we do not accept responsibility for changes made to this message after it was sent. While attachments are scanned, the recipient should check this email & attachments for viruses as we don't accept liability for damage caused by any transmitted viruses. This notice should remain intact.

From: Amanda Brown [mailto:amanda@yourinsurancesolutions.com.au]

Sent: Tuesday, 12 May 2020 3:41 PM

To: Brenden Anforth <Brenden.Anforth@sura.com.au>

Cc: Lidia Grgic <Lidia.Grgic@oraclegroup.com.au>; 'david@eagleinsurancecom.au' <david@eagleinsurancecom.au>

Subject: RE: URGENT Payment GOLDCOASTI

Good Afternoon Brenden,

Thank you for your email.

As discussed the funds have been remitted to Eagle and I spoke with Dave Bailey this morning in regard to this and they have received the funds, however he was unsure if this has been paid to you as yet he has to check with Jack in the accounts department.

I have requested that this be settled as soon as possible to avoid any more dramas with this policy.

I trust all makes sense, I am sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Cheers,

Amanda Brown

Director

Your Insurance Solutions

PO Box 345

Albany Creek Qld 4035

p 0438 922 362

e amanda@yourinsurancesolutions.com.au

Your Insurance Services Pty Ltd (AR. 420745) of Oracle Group (Australia) Pty Ltd

ABN 75 131 025 600 AFSL 363610

This email and any attachments have been sent by Your Insurance Solutions Pty Ltd (ABN 48 155 885 313) and are intended solely for the addressee. It is confidential, may contain personal information and may be subject to legal professional privilege. Unauthorised use is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful. If you have received this by mistake, confidentiality and any legal privilege are not waived or lost and we ask that you contact the sender and delete and destroy this and any other copies. Your Insurance Solutions will not be liable in connection with any data corruption, interruption, delay, computer virus or unauthorised access or amendment to the contents of this email.

From: Brenden Anforth <Brenden.Anforth@sura.com.au>

Sent: Tuesday, 12 May 2020 3:19 PM

To: Amanda Brown <amanda@yourinsurancesolutions.com.au>

Cc: Lidia Grgic <Lidia.Grgic@oraclegroup.com.au>

Subject: FW: URGENT Payment GOLDCOASTI

Hi Amanda,

We're still chasing up payment for this account, and we have now been advised by the other oracle broker that the accounts department have allocated the money to your brokerage.

Could you please double check this and let us know if the money is there, and when we can be expecting payment, as this account is considerably overdue and I'm getting a lot of pressure on my end to get this off the debt register.

Kind regards,

Brenden Anforth

Underwriter

T: +61 2 9047 9801 | E: Brenden.Anforth@sura.com.au | Website: www.sura.com.au/plant-and-equipment

SURA Plant and Equipment, 141 Walker Street, North Sydney NSW 2060

SURA Plant and Equipment Pty Ltd ABN 85 087 238 837 is an Authorised Representative of SURA Pty Ltd ABN 36 115 672 350 AFSL 294313

Sent: Friday, 8 May 2020 10:13 AM

To: Brenden Anforth <Brenden.Anforth@sura.com.au>

Subject: FW: URGENT Payment GOLDCOASTI

Sent: Thursday, 30 April 2020 10:01 AM

To: Adam Pile - Insurance HQ <adam@inshq.com.au>

Cc: Danielle Fenton - Insurance HQ <danielle@inshq.com.au>

Subject: RE: URGENT Payment GOLDCOASTI

Hi Adam

Confirming I've now transferred the funds over the other broker, who'll organise payment to Sura.

Thanks

Lidia Grgic

ACCOUNTANT

T: (08) 6500 1406

F: (08) 6270 1015

PO Box 1859, Osborne Park DC WA 6916

Suite 3.1, 110 Erindale Road, Balcatta WA 6021

Oracle Group (Australia) Pty Ltd

ABN: 75 131 025 600

AFSL: 363610

www.oraclegroup.com.au

Please consider the environment before printing this email

IMPORTANT NOTICE: The information in this email is confidential and may also be privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, any use or dissemination of the information and any disclosure or copying of this email is unauthorised and strictly prohibited.

If you have received this email in error, please promptly inform us by reply email or telephone. You should also delete this email and destroy any hard copies produced.

Electronic Delivery of Documentation and Disclosure

Please note that where possible we prefer to provide all correspondence and disclosure notices (including Financial Services Guide and Product Disclosure Statements) to you electronically, via email or links to websites etc. If you have provided your email address to us we will typically use that email address for all correspondence and disclosure notices. Should you not wish to be sent disclosure documents electronically please advise us and we will update our records accordingly.

From: Adam Pile - Insurance HQ <adam@inshq.com.au>

Sent: Wednesday, 29 April 2020 12:26 PM

To: Lidia Grgic <Lidia.Grgic@oraclegroup.com.au>

Cc: Danielle Fenton - Insurance HQ <danielle@inshq.com.au>

Subject: URGENT Payment GOLDCOASTI

Lidia,

This is the partial funding payment we did for another AR's client. Can you please get this paid to Sura Plant & machinery ASAP.

We have no way to check has been done as is on other brokers portfolio.

Thanks

Adam

From: Adam Pile - Insurance HQ

Sent: Thursday, 9 April 2020 2:05 PM

To: Lidia Grgic <Lidia.Grgic@oraclegroup.com.au>

Cc: Danielle Fenton - Insurance HQ <danielle@inshq.com.au>

Subject: Funding Payment to Other AR GOLDCOASTI

Lidia,

Not sure best way to notify you of this so thought would just send it to you.

1. Your Insurance Solutions have a client with a part paid policy to Sura Plant (invoice attached)

2. We have organised funding for the shortfall premium (funding contract attached)

3. When funds received from funder can you please credit to Your Insurance Solutions and make URGENT payment.

I assume won't be too hard as the policy number should be the reference, just might be the different funding account that throws you off.

We have LOA'd the policy to sort but still letting payment and comms go via Amanda for this policy that is 5 months past due.

Any dramas let me know.

Regards.

Adam Pile Dip FS (Broking)

BUSINESS INSURANCE SPECIALIST

Authorised Representative No. 1244546

Oracle Group (Australia) Pty Ltd AFSL 363610 P: 1300 815 344

M: 0402 472 833

PO Box 510, Ormeau QLD 4208

www.inshq.com.au

Financial Services

LinkedIn

DISCLAIMER: This email contains general information only. It does not take into account your objectives, financial situation or needs. Please consider the appropriateness of this information considering your personal circumstances and read the relevant Product Disclosure Statement before acquiring any product mentioned in this email. This email is confidential and is for the intended recipient only. If you are not the intended recipient do not use or rely on this information and please contact us on 1300 815 344 and delete all copies of this email. If you do not wish to receive future emails from us, please notify us by return email. Any personal information you provide to Insurance HQ Pty Ltd will be collected, stored, used and disclosed in accordance with our Privacy Policy which can be obtained by contacting our office on 1300 815 344. We provide your information to insurance companies and other intermediaries to provide insurance quotes and offer insurance terms to you, or the companies that deal with your insurance claim (such as loss assessors and claims staff). Your information may be given to an overseas insurer (like Lloyds of London) if we are seeking insurance terms from an overseas insurer. We will tell you where those companies are located at the time of advising you. We do not trade, rent or sell your information.
